body_html:
for example my total GPU Memory Size is 4G

gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5)
with tf.Session(config=tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options)) as sess:

=> tensorflow use 2G GPU memory only
but,
gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.4)
with sv.prepare_or_wait_for_session(server.target, config=tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options)) as sess:

=> tensorflow use 4G GPU memory
